attributes.action: officially recognise Joe Sanders as the Pope
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Joe Sanders is the pope. Pope Benedict XVI kidnapped Joe Sanders, and locked in the vaults of the Vatican so that he would not become pope. Furthermore Pope Joe Sanders appeared on Wikipedia for around 10 minutes as the offical pope.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
